# AttributeDynamicLookup

**Enumeration**

A type to support dynamic member lookup of attributes and containers.

## Declaration

```swift
@dynamicMemberLookup @frozen enum AttributeDynamicLookup
```

## Overview

This type allows attribute owners to add extensions that enable dynamic member lookup access to attributes. Supporting types — including [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributedString], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributedSubstring], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeContainer] — gain dynamic lookup support by extending this type.

You can enable dynamic member lookup for your own [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributedStringKey] attributes by defining them as implementations, collecting them into an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScope] and extending [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeDynamicLookup], like in the following example:

```swift
public extension AttributeDynamicLookup {
    subscript<T: AttributedStringKey>(dynamicMember keyPath: KeyPath<AttributeScopes.MyFrameworkAttributes, T>) -> T {
        return self[T.self]
    }
}
```

## Accessing Key Values

- **subscript(_:)**: Returns an attributed string key that corresponds to a specified type.

## Accessing Framework Attribute Scopes

- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**: Returns the attributed string key for a specified Foundation key path.
- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**: Returns the attributed string key for a specified Foundation number format key path.
- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**: Returns the attributed string key for a specified SwiftUI key path.
- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**: Returns the attributed string key for a specified UIKit key path.
- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**: Returns the attributed string key for a specified AppKit key path.

## Subscripts

- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**
- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**
- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**

## Using Defined Attributes

- **AttributeScopes**: Collections of attributes that system frameworks define.
- **ScopedAttributeContainer**: An attribute container that allows dynamic member lookup of its contents within the specified attribute scope.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Copyable
